body_content.explanation: a name that you enter in order to be able to use a computer system:
examples: Type your login at the prompt.
Now you can access electronic resources from anywhere with a single login.

body_content.explanation: an act of entering your name in order to be able to start using a computer system:
examples: These records document the user name and time of login.
We have the time and date of the last login for each user.

body_content.explanation: a place on a screen where you click (= press) and enter a name in order to start using a computer system:
examples: We have added a login to the home page.
Go to login and enter your username.
